DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ABU accepts  
a) NCE merit in Arabic.  
b) General English/Use of English at NCE satisfies 
‘O’  level English requirements.  
(ii) ABUJA accepts a minimum of ten (10) points in NCE 
or NDupper credit in addition to the ‘O’ 
levelrequirements.  
(iii) ILORIN accepts NCE merit in Arabic or Social 
Sciences subjects.  
(iv) ILORIN considers candidates who do not offer Arabic 
at the UTME but meet the UTME requirements.  
(v) KWASU accepts IJMB, Cambridge, NCE and SISC.  
(vi) LASU accepts   
a) Two (2)‘A’levelpasses in Arabic and any other 
Arts subject plus five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
in other related Arts subjects.  
b) Certificates issued by recognized Arabic 
Institutionsare accepted in lieu of Arabic 'O' 
level subjects to the fulfillment of other entry 
requirements. NCE meritin Arabic is acceptable.
